channel.title: Day 4 schedule on Decision Modeling in R Workshop

item.title: Probabilistic sensitivity analysis in R
item.description: Here you find all the files for the sensitivity analysis session. To avoid issued with directories, we recommend storing all files in one folder. Slides SensitivityAnalysisSlides.pptx Demostration Please download Functions.R under student exercise template. Functions_decision_tree_HVE.R decision_tree_HVE_PSA_solutions.rmd Exercise worksheet markov_sick-sicker_PSA_exercise.pdf Student exercise template Functions we use: Functions.R Functions_markov_sick-sicker.R markov_sick-sicker_PSA_template.rmd Instructor solutions markov_sick-sicker_PSA_solutions.rmd
